lines.gurmukhi: sbd suriq ilv gurisK sMD imly; pMc prpMc imty pMc prDwny hY [

Unknown.translation: With the meeting of Guru and Sikh, and engrossment of the latter in the divine word, he is able to counter the deceit of five vices-kam, krodh, lobh, moh and ahankar. The five virtues of Truth, Contentment, Compassion, Devotion and Patience become paramou

lines.gurmukhi: BwgY BY Brm Byd kwl Aau krm Kyd; log byd aulMiG audoq gur igAwny hY [

Unknown.translation: All his doubts, fear and discriminatory feelings are destroyed. He is not hunted by the worldly discomforts those accrue from worldly activities.

lines.gurmukhi: mwieAw Aau bRhm sm dsm duAwr pwir; Anhd runJun bwjq nIswny hY [

Unknown.translation: With his conscious awareness firmly lodged in the mystical tenth opening, the worldly attractions and Lord appears alike to him. He sees the image of the Lord in every creature of the world. And in such a state, he remains engrossed in the celestial music

lines.gurmukhi: aunmn mgn ggn jgmg joiq; inJr Apwr Dwr prm inDwny hY [29[

Unknown.translation: In such a high spiritual state, he enjoys heavenly bliss and the divine light shines in him. He is ever relishing the divine elixir of Naam. (29)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: g`l kIh ik ies AgMmI DunI dI qwr dy shwry gurmuK dI suriq aunmn auqkMiTq hoeI qIbr auqswh sMpMn hoeI mgn ho jwˆdI hY vw aunmnI AvsQw ivc lIn ho jwˆdI hY jd ik ggn AwkwS = suMn = APur mMfl ivKy jg mg jÎoqI dw pRkwS swKÎwqkwrqw nUM pRwpq hoieAw krdw hY qy prm inDwn mhwn inDIAwˆ dw AsQwn rUp idbÎ AMimRq dI Apwr Dwrw iek rs sRivAw krdI ies nUM AibnwSI iqRpqI bKiSAw krdI hY ]29]
